subproject.corporate outcome: Electoral laws, processes and institutions strengthen inclusive participation and professional electoral administration
subproject.description: Through a robust 6 months technical assistnace programme targeting the above referred areas, it is expected to support NEC and PPRC on a daily basis by training of the technical/operational staff, revision and updating internal procedures and programmes, improving legal framework to bridge identified shortcomings in the existing laws and constitutional provisions, developing strategic long term plans anchored on the sustainability of electoral administration and instituional development. the expexted results will be the improvement of the existing baselines in the above referred domains and assembly of critical inputs to design, plan and implement the 2010-2013 electoral cycle programme in a way that will improve the organisation of 2012 elections and increase ownership and autonomy of both NEC and PPRC.
subproject.title: STRENGTHENING ELECTORAL MNT CA

title: SUPPORT TO ELECTORAL MANAGEMENT BODIES - PHASE II
